games.name: Guess the story
games.description: An addictive game with confusing stories to be solved

example.message: The main player gets the story and reads to the players
A bright flash - and a man is dead.
He was killed by a man?
He was killed by an animal?
The player asked the wrong question. The question should have the answer "Yes" or "No".
Did it happen in the circus?
Maybe it was show in the circus and somebody make picture with light and lion scared and killed the man?
Yes. But how lion killed the man?
During the show he put his head in the jaws of the lion?

Answer: The rescuer put his head in the jaws of the lion and then someone decided to photograph the whole thing. The lion was frightened by the flash and slammed his mouth shut. The trainer was left without a head.

rules.title: Receiving an assignment
rules.description: The main player reads aloud a part of the story, after which he looks at the answer, but does not pronounce it.

rules.title: Game process
rules.description: Players begin to ask questions, to which the main player can answer only "Yes" or "No".

rules.title: Additional rule
rules.description: The number of player questions is unlimited.

rules.title: End of the game
rules.description: After the players have successfully revealed the whole story the game is considered finished.

rules.title: Recommendation
rules.description: Players can go on to unravel the next story.
